Text:
Why is it a RAR file?
MP3 audio files don't compress.

Why didn't you just make a torrent of the folder containing the MP3 files?
Easier to upload one file instead of 8.  That's all.  I tested it and it extracts excellently.

It is as esy to upload one directory as one file.
And no need for rar-ing. Downloading becomesnicer as you can pick the files you want.
